GeneralSection.Name: General Options
IsShakerActive.Name: Shaker Is Active
IsShakerActive.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker mod is active.
ToggleShaker.Name: Toggle Shaker Keybind
ToggleShaker.Description: Keybinding to toggle the AutoShaker on and off.
UsePlayerMagnetism.Name: Use Player Magnetism Distance?
UsePlayerMagnetism.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes at the same distance players can pick up items. Note: Overrides 'Shake Distance'
ShakeDistance.Name: Shake Distance
ShakeDistance.Description: Distance to shake bushes when not using 'Player Magnetism.'
LinkSection.Name: Toggle Option Categories
RegularTreePage.Name: Seed Trees
RegularTreeSection.Name: Seed Tree Toggles
ShakeAllRegularTrees.Name: Toggle All Seed Trees
ShakeAllRegularTrees.Description: Toggle shaking of ALL Seed trees, including Palm trees.
ShakeMahoganyTrees.Name: Shake Mahogany Trees?
ShakeMahoganyTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Mahogany trees that you walk by for Mahogany Seeds.
ShakeMapleTrees.Name: Shake Maple Trees?
ShakeMapleTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Maple trees that you walk by for Maple Seeds and Hazelnuts.
ShakeOakTrees.Name: Shake Oak Trees?
ShakeOakTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Oak trees that you walk by for Acorns.
ShakePalmTrees.Name: Shake Palm Trees?
ShakePalmTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Palm trees that you walk by for Coconuts.
ShakePineTrees.Name: Shake Pine Trees?
ShakePineTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Pine trees that you walk by for Pine Cones.
FruitTreePage.Name: Fruit Trees
FruitTreeSection.Name: Fruit Tree Toggles
FruitsReadyToShake.Name: Minimum Fruits Ready to Shake
FruitsReadyToShake.Description: Minimum amount of fruits a Fruit Tree should have ready before the AutoShaker shakes the tree.
ShakeAllFruitTrees.Name: Toggle All Fruit Trees
ShakeAllFruitTrees.Description: Toggle shaking of ALL Fruit trees.
ShakeAppleTrees.Name: Shake Apple Trees?
ShakeAppleTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Apple trees that you walk by for Apples.
ShakeApricotTrees.Name: Shake Apricot Trees?
ShakeApricotTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Apricot trees that you walk by for Apricots.
ShakeBananaTrees.Name: Shake Banana Trees?
ShakeBananaTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Banana trees that you walk by for Bananas.
ShakeCherryTrees.Name: Shake Cherry Trees?
ShakeCherryTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Cherry trees that you walk by for Cherries.
ShakeMangoTrees.Name: Shake Mango Trees?
ShakeMangoTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Mango trees that you walk by for Mangos.
ShakeOrangeTrees.Name: Shake Orange Trees?
ShakeOrangeTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Orange trees that you walk by for Oranges.
ShakePeachTrees.Name: Shake Peach Trees?
ShakePeachTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Peach trees that you walk by for Peaches.
ShakePomegranateTrees.Name: Shake Pomegranate Trees?
ShakePomegranateTrees.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Pomegranate trees that you walk by for Pomegranates
BushesPage.Name: Bushes
BushesSection.Name: Bushes Toggles
ShakeAllBushes.Name: Toggle All Bushes
ShakeSalmonberries.Name: Shake Salmonberry Bushes?
ShakeSalmonberries.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes that you walk by for Salmonberries.
ShakeBlackberries.Name: Shake Blackberry Bushes?
ShakeBlackberries.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes that you walk by for Blackberries.
ShakeTeaBushes.Name: Shake Tea Bushes?
ShakeTeaBushes.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Tea bushes that you walk by for Tea Leaves.
ShakeWalnutBushes.Name: Shake Golden Walnut Bushes?
ShakeWalnutBushes.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Walnut bushes that you walk by for Golden Walnuts.
ForageablesPage.Name: Forageables
ForageablesSection.Name: [EXPERIMENTAL] Forageables Toggles
PullAllForageables.Name: Toggle All Forageables
PullForageables.Name: Pull Forageable Items?
PullForageables.Description: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull forageables that you walk by.
